body.name: LIPETY Foldable Oscillating Standing Fan with Remote Control, 8" Portable Desk Quiet Fan, 7200mah Rechargeable USB Small Fan, Folded Floor Pedestal Fan for Bedroom Office Camp Travel
features: 8" Foldable Stand Telescopic Fan: unique folding telescopic design, portable small size, 8" in diameter, adjustable height - 4.1" when folded and 40" full stretched, easily meet your different needs for height. Lightweight (net weight: 860g), easily moved & carried, could be used as a indoor fan such as desk fan, table fan, pedestal fan, floor fan and stand up fan, used as a outdoor fan such as travel fan, camping fan.

Oscillating Fan with Romote Controller: 60° smooth oscillating fan, the remote control with switch, timer, oscillation, speed functions, you can easily control your personal fan as you like, enjoy a convenient life.

Super Quiet Fan: 4 levels wind - breeze wind / soft wind / strong wind / natural wind mode, the remote controller adds sleep mode, super silent 30~40db, could used as a bedoom bedside fan, enjoy a peaceful cooling sleeping.

7200mah Battery Powered: bulit-in 7200mah rechargeable battery, support use while charging, 1.5m USB-C cable, 5V safe low voltage, about 4 hours full charged, 5 ~23.5 hours working time depends on different speeds.

Angle Adjustable and Detachable Clean: multi-angle adjustable(axial rotation - 75°, back and forth rotation - 180°), and its front grille is detachable, easy to clean. Designed with anti-slip silicone pad on the bottom of base, makes the fan more stable. Ideal for home, office and outdoor use.

Portable Desktop / Standing Fan: can be used as a personal table fan or a vertical fan, small and easy to carry, you can easily put the ventilador in your backpack or drawer. Quite suitable for personal domitory, bedroom, living room, kitchen, office, classroom, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's small and portable and the fact that it's USB charged is fantastic it can be a small for a table top or tall enough to be by your bed The air blows fantastic out of it and you have a remote for it it's actually my new perfect fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely perfect in every way
reviews.reviewText: I’m a very picky person when it comes to my sleep and white noise is a must. I was traveling for work and staying in a hotel. This fan absolutely saved my life. I got the best sleep of my life! It has a strong breeze, is compact, and stays charged for a long time. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Portable, quiet, poor battery life
reviews.reviewText: The foldable oscillating fan I recently purchased has been a convenient addition to my summer essentials. Its portable and small design makes it easy to carry around and store, allowing me to use it in different areas of my home. The fact that it is battery-operated adds to its portability, eliminating the need for a power outlet. The fan operates quietly, creating a soothing breeze without any distracting noise. Another great feature is the inclusion of a remote control, enabling effortless adjustments from a distance. However, the fan's battery life is somewhat limited, requiring frequent recharging. Additionally, it cannot be left plugged in, which can be inconvenient. Despite these minor drawbacks, this foldable oscillating fan offers great convenience and functionality, making it a worthwhile choice for portable cooling needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: SO QUIET, GREAT FORCE, VERY COMPACTI would give this 10 STARS if I could. I am ALLLLWAYYYYSSS SO HOT, it's horrible and very uncomfortable. This fan can be taken anywhere and even with being wireless it is so POWERFUL. I was so impressed. It can be used on the beach, in hotel rooms, while doing yoga outside. It's wonderful. It even oscillates! Very great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I traveled overseas with it
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to bring along on a trip. I actually used it for 1 day to dry off my clothing in Costa Rica. Good charge, pretty powerful. Great buy and no problem with the overall fan. Definitely worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PIECE OF TRASH---DON'T BUY!
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great in theory. The first one I ordered on May 22 lasted until TODAY (a day after I requested a return on my 3rd on, which lasted all of 3 hours before dying). I bought a second one for a co-worker after he admired mine. It died as well. Fan #2 died AFTER the 30 day return period, so, I ordered a replacement, which I recieved a few days ago and it died in the water within 2-3 hours. I am returning fan #3, but am now the owner of 1 fan that lasted May 22-Aug 15 (just died today), One fan delivered June 20th, which I bought as a gift for a co-worker and it only worked for a few weeks, and now a fan that was a replacement for fan #2 which lasted 2-3 hours, died, and I will get a refund on. Fan #1 was awesome while it lasted, and you can buy an extended warranty for for $7.99. I wouldn't think to buy a $7.99 3 year warranty on a fan that's priced at $38, but DO IT if you're going to buy this fan! You'll probably replace it 20 times ovee that span! I ended up buying myself an amazon basics fan and will just use it on my desk at work with an extension cord. Just ordered my Co worker a plug in fan as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with this fan!
reviews.reviewText: I finally used this fan last night. I was very impressed with how well it worked, how quiet it was, and that it oscillates!! So often when I buy something like this on impulse it ends up being junk. Not this time!!I’m a fan of this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery and charging cable don’t last
reviews.reviewText: I have had this fan for six months now. I have taken it with me to hotels and on a cruise ship just last week. It has been such a life saver for me because it’s so compact and great. But here lately, the battery doesn’t seem to hold a charge no matter what I do. The cord doesn’t work anymore. It flashes like it’s charging but then I wake up and will notice that the fan isn’t even on anymore. I love this fan and was hoping to get more use out of it…
The fan is quiet and provides 3 speeds. The telescopic works. It is also portable…folds up great.
Ventilateur sur Pied Silencieux, impeccable, agréable. Aucun regret de cet achat au contraire.

Antes de nada, dejo claro que es un ventilador bastante pequeño, sirve para tenerlo en un escritorio de trabajo o una mesita de noche, si vas con la intención de un ventilador grande de pie, NO te va a servir, por eso lo devolví yo.En cuánto a usarlo en una mesa, es bastante cómodo y hace un caudal de aire decente, tiene un programa de noche que apenas hace ruido, así que para una mesita de noche es bastante bueno.El ventilador se puede recoger siendo bastante portátil y sencillo de guardar. Gracias a esto también puede ser útil para llevártelo a un camping en verano, ya que ocupa poco y la batería tiene una duración considerable.Resumiendo, si quieres un ventilador para una mesa de trabajo o para llevártelo por ahí es una muy buena opción, si necesitas un ventilador de pie grande, sigue buscando.

reviews.reviewTitle: È diventato il mio migliore amico ;)
reviews.reviewText: Leggero, efficiente, silenzioso, non ingombrante, design pulito, telecomando con vano sulla base del ventilatore per essere riposto senza il rischio di perderlo. In questa lunga e caldissima estate l'ho portato ovunque anche in viaggio. Si ricarica velocemente con cavetto USB-C (in dotazione). C O N S I G L I A T I S S I M O!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is honestly the best fan I've ever bought and being a woman of a certain age, I've bought lots over the last couple of years!It arrived quickly, great value for money, it's so easy to set up, it's silent, very powerful with different settings plus the fact it can oscillate (if you actually want to share the breeze!) lasts all night on less than a full charge plus will be compact to store when I eventually decide to put it away.
